message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly exceptional and I believe it could greatly benefit your business. Given its value, I propose a price of $14,000 for the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I agree the product looks valuable, I believe $14,000 is a bit steep. Would you consider $10,000?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. Considering the value of the product and your needs, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $12,500 for the product.
Thanks for your flexibility, Alice. I'm getting closer to a price point where I can make this work.  How about we settle at $11,000?
I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $11,500 for the product. This is my final offer.
